description: We are “Sweet Surrender on Wheels”! We offer plenty of options to satisfy your particular craving, daily.  Our freshly baked goods can now be found in various locations around Nassau County.  Follow us on Facebook or check out our twitter feed to see where we are on any given day.Hungry?We’ve got everything from bagels with cream cheese to egg sandwiches and paninis made fresh as ordered.Craving for a sweet?We’ve got donuts, muffins, scones, cupcakes as well as several other pastries.Sweet Surrender on Wheels is the only place, outside of our bakery, that you’ll find our signature dessert – the Crannoli™, a croissant, donut & cannoli all in one! Catering available for private parties and events in Nassau, Suffolk and all 5 boroughs of New York City.  Call us at 516-343-3720 for more information.Make your next event a memorable one – end it with a treat from Sweet Surrender!
name: Sweet Surrender
